source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_00<tab>Radovan has found a citizen of Ul'dah in need of a bodyguard.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_00<tab>クイックサンドのラドヴァンは、何やら遠い目をしている。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_01<tab>Sophie and Radovan's search for the next client has borne fruit, although they have yet to ascertain the nature of the assignment. A woman named Oriel has asked that you meet her near the Gate of Thal to discuss the details.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_01<tab>ラドヴァンに護衛の仕事が入ったようだ。ウルダハのザル大門で依頼人の「オリエル」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_02<tab>Oriel and her son, Timm, are in need of protection from her estranged husband, Gerrart, who persists in harassing the young mother. As he is in the habit of surprising her in locations where he is unlikely to be seen, Oriel suggests luring him outside of the city walls and catching him by surprise. You and Radovan accept the task of waiting for Gerrart to accost her before sending him scurrying with his tail between his legs.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_02<tab>オリエルと話し、彼女に付きまとう別れた夫、ゲラートから母子を護衛することになった。中央ザナラーンの刺抜盆地で「ラドヴァン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_03<tab>Outside of the Gate of Thal, Gerrart appears from nowhere to bother Oriel, exactly as she had predicted. Radovan, deciding that he has seen enough, makes his presence known, and states in no uncertain terms that Gerrart should leave his wife and child in peace or face the consequences. The man is soon cowed and beats a hasty retreat, leaving Oriel to congratulate you all on a job well done before saying her farewells. Sophie, however, cannot escape the feeling that something is amiss, and urges you to go after Oriel.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_03<tab>ラドヴァンと話し、現れたゲラートに警告した。ソフィーが気になることがあるので、オリエルを尾行するという。東ザナラーンのドライボーンで「ラドヴァン」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_04<tab>Following Sophie's hunch, you find Oriel in conversation with two thoroughly suspicious characters, and it soon becomes clear she intends to sell her own child into slavery. It is at this very moment that Gerrart appears, although his attempt to rescue his son is swiftly thwarted. Just as Radovan prepares to burst forth and save him, he finds himself racked with pain and totally immobilized. The slavers have every intention of silencing the witness to their foul deeds, and only you and Sophie are in any position to stop them.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_04<tab>オリエルは息子を人買いに売ろうとしていた。そこへ、ゲラートが止めに入ったが、倒されてしまった。ドライボーンで、人買いの男たちを討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_05<tab>The two slave traders never stood a chance against your gunblade, and the immediate danger has been averted. Gerrart's reckless charge at two armed men ended with him being sent sprawling, and he is fortunate to have escaped with only minor injuries. Now that he has recovered somewhat, you decide to press him for an explanation on how this sorry incident came to pass.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_05<tab>人買の男たちを討伐した。ドライボーンで、「ゲラート」を救助しよう。

source:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_06Gerrart reveals that as a result of his gambling and ever-increasing debt, Oriel left him to seek a new life, taking their infant son with her. She quickly became entangled with members of Ul'dah's dark underbelly, and turned to somnus as a means of numbing herself to the misery that had consumed her. Meanwhile, Gerrart had made an earnest attempt to put his vices behind him and had secured a steady income. When he felt ready to face Oriel, he found that she had fallen into dire straits, placing the blame entirely upon himself. Gerrart intends to use the money he has saved to send Oriel to Frondale's Phrontistery for the treatment she needs, while he takes custody of Timm. Although there is no certainty that his wife will ever return to her former self, Gerrart is determined to salvage what he can from the wreckage of his broken family.

Radovan is not entirely satisfied with the outcome of the day's events, and offers an apology for once again making a burden of himself. He explains that he still suffers the aftereffects of the electric shocks administered by Garlean gaol wardens while he was incarcerated for insubordination. Radovan had spent ten years secretly digging a tunnel in an attempt to escape, only to find himself bursting through the wall of Sophie's cell. Making their way outside of the gates in the commotion that followed, they ran until they were beyond the reach of the Empire. Wishing to continue their journey through Eorzea, Sophie and Radovan suggest moving on to Limsa Lominsa in search of new prospects.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_06<tab>ゲラートを救助した。オリエルはソムヌス香中毒で、ゲラートは息子を救おうとしていたようだ。ゲラートはこれから、家族とやり直すと誓うのだった。ラドヴァンは次の仕事をリムサ・ロミンサで探すという。リムサ・ロミンサの溺れた海豚亭で「ラドヴァン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_07Once again, Radovan and Sophie have introduced themselves to the local Adventurers' Guild. While there are no jobs suitable for your group at present, it is only a matter of time before someone has need of a gunbreaker or two.

※The next gunbreaker quest will be available from Radovan upon reaching level 65.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SEQ_07ラドヴァンと話した。護衛の仕事が見つかるまで、冒険者は鍛錬を積むことになった。

※ガンブレイカーのレベルが65以上になると、溺れた海豚亭のラドヴァンから次のガンブレイカークエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Oriel at the Gate of Thal.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_TODO_00<tab>ザル大門のオリエルと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Radovan at Spineless Basin.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_TODO_01<tab>刺抜盆地のラドヴァンと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Radovan in Drybone.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_TODO_02<tab>ドライボーンのラドヴァンと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_TODO_03<tab>Defeat the slavers.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_TODO_03<tab>人買いの男たちを討伐する

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_TODO_04<tab>Aid Gerrart.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_TODO_04<tab>ゲラートを救助

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Radovan in the Drowning Wench.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_TODO_05<tab>溺れた海豚亭のラドヴァンと話す

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_100_000<tab>I want to go and see the famous Gold Saucer, but Radovan says we're on too tight a budget to fritter our money away like that. I'll try asking him again once we find some more lucrative work.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_100_000ゴールドソーサーってところに行ってみたいんだけど、
オッサンが遊びに来たんじゃないってうるさいんだ。
息抜きも必要だと思わない……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_000<tab>The walls that surround this city remind me of my homeland. We built it as a fortress to keep out invaders.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_000よく来てくれた、)) (( )) 02 /var>……。
この街には、どこか懐かしさを感じていたのだが、
城塞に囲まれた姿が祖国に似ていることに気がついた。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_001<tab>Not that it made much difference...in the end.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_001帝国に支配された我が国は、こうも賑やかではなかったがな。
それでもまだ、故郷がこの世に存在していた頃はよかった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_002<tab>Oh, not this again! Perhaps you could lighten the mood by sharing our recent bit of good news?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_002ちょっと、ひとりで感傷的にならないでよ。
)) (( )) 02 /var>が、困っちゃうじゃない。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_003<tab>Ah, yes. It looks like we've found our next client.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_003すまない、年のせいか、つい……。
私の話はさておいて、護衛の依頼が舞い込んできたぞ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_004<tab>Nothing's been decided, but a lady named Oriel is waiting for us near the Gate of Thal. We'll meet you there.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_004依頼人は「オリエル」という女性だ。
ザル大門にて、彼女と待ち合わせしているので、
話を聞きにいこう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_007<tab>Perhaps I should let you do the talking.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_007<tab>オリエルさんから依頼の内容を聞こう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_008<tab>I hope this doesn't involve any babysitting...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_008<tab>かわいいお子さんだね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIELSBOY_000_009<tab>I'm not supposed to talk to strangers.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIELSBOY_000_009<tab>は、はじめまして……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIEL_000_010<tab>You're the bodyguards, right? We need your help! It's my husband─after he walked out, I thought I'd seen the last of him, but now... You've got to keep him away from us!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIEL_000_010どうも、依頼したオリエルといいます。
お願いしたいのは、私と息子のティムの護衛……
付きまとってくる別れた夫から、私たちを護ってほしいのです。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_011<tab>Ah...I'm not sure we're qualified to settle domestic disputes.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_011ううむ……困ったぞ。
これは、我らが介入すべきなのだろうか？
相手が元夫ならば、オリエルさんからしっかりと言った方が……

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_012<tab>Radovan! This sounds serious. Hear her out, would you!?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_012そう言わず、引き受けてあげなよ……。
別れた女に執着する男は、何をしでかすかわからないからね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_013<tab>Very well. My apologies. Please continue.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_013そ、そういうものか……。
わかった、あなたたちをお護りしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIEL_000_014<tab>His name's Gerrart. He won't leave us alone, and he keeps jumping out to harass us when we're by ourselves. If we were to go outside the city gates, I'm sure he'd follow us. And when he does, I want you to scare him off!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIEL_000_014ありがとうございます。
元夫の「ゲラート」は、ひとけのないところで現れます。
私が街の外にでも出れば、きっと言い寄ってくるでしょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_015<tab>I doubt he'll show himself if he sees you have bodyguards, so we'll wait somewhere nearby. When the moment is right, we'll give him a fright he won't forget in a hurry.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_015なるほど、それでは我らは物陰に隠れておいて、
ゲラートが現れたら、すぐさま飛び出すことにしよう。
そして、付きまとわぬよう警告し、従わぬなら脅しをかけよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIEL_000_016<tab>Yes, that ought to work. Timm and I will leave through this gate, so you should find a hiding place. It's time that bastard─excuse my language─learned his lesson!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIEL_000_016どうぞ、よろしくお願いします。
では、中央ザナラーンの刺抜盆地あたりに向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIEL_000_017<tab>If he tries anything, make him pay!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIEL_000_017<tab>どうか、物陰に隠れていてください。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIELSBOY_000_018<tab>Are we waiting for Daddy?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIELSBOY_000_018<tab>お父ちゃん……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_019<tab>This husband of hers sounds like a nasty piece of work. We'd best be ready for trouble.
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_019<tab>ゲラートってのは、どんな男なんだろうね……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_020<tab>Remember, we've got the boy to think about. I'd rather not cut a man down in front of his own son, but I will if I have to. You follow my lead.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_020できるだけ手荒な真似はしたくない、
ゲラートが現れたら、まずは私から警告しよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_021<tab>Get away from her!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_021そこまでだ！
彼女から離れろ……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_022<tab>What!? Who the bloody hells are you?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_022<tab>な、なんだ、あんたらは……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_023<tab>Friends of Oriel. Now walk away, while you still can.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_023我らはオリエルさんに雇われた護衛。
彼女に付きまとうのは、もうやめるんだ……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_024<tab>But I only want what's best for my boy!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_024そんな……
俺は息子を護りたいだけ……

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIEL_000_025<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Your<var 1A 01 /var> boy!? You've got no right to call him that. He belongs to me!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIEL_000_025この子の親権は私にあるの！
あなたはもう、私たちに関わらないでちょうだい！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_026<tab>This is your final warning. Bother them again, and you won't live to regret it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_026二度とオリエルさんたちに付きまとうな！
さもなくば、痛い目に遭うことになるぞ……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIEL_000_027<tab>Ha ha! That'll teach him. And you were wonderful─worth every gil! Thank you so much!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIEL_000_027よかった！
これでやっと、安心できます。
どうもありがとうございました……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_028<tab>It was our pleasure.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_028喧嘩沙汰にならずに済んでよかった。
かなり脅してやったので、さすがに懲りたろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_029<tab>Although there wasn't much for you to do, your presence lent weight to my words. But most importantly, the client was satisfied with our work.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_029今回は君の力を借りるまでもなかったが、
誰も傷つくことなく、穏便に済んでなにより……

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_030<tab>Yes, she did seem rather pleased with herself...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_030待って……。
あのオリエルって人、まさか……

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_031<tab>Listen, you two! There's no time to explain. We have to follow that woman!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_031ごめん、どうしても気になることがあるの。
彼女を尾行させて！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_032<tab>Hells' bells! When Sophie gets one of her hunches, there's no stopping her!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_032いったいぜんたい、何が起こっているのかサッパリだが、
我らも後を追おう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_036<tab>I knew she was up to something!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_036彼女、やっぱり怪しい。
こんなところで、何を……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_040<tab>Why would she bring Timm all the way out here?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_040オリエルさんは、こんなところでいったい……
おっと、誰か来たようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_HIGHLANDER03263_000_041<tab>What're we s'posed to do with a runt like this?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_HIGHLANDER03263_000_041この子か……。
ちょいと幼すぎるんじゃないか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_MIDLANDER03263_000_042<tab>If we feed 'im up, 'e might be worth summink one day.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_MIDLANDER03263_000_042いや、数年もすればいい働き手になる。
今のうちに買っとかない手はない……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_043<tab>She's selling her own child!? We've got to stop them!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_043ま、まさか、子供を売る気か……！？
許せん……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_100_043<tab>Wait, is that...?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_100_043<tab>むむ、あれは……！？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_044<tab>Enough of this!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_044<tab>待て……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_100_044<tab>Stay away from my son!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_100_044<tab>俺の息子は渡さない……！！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_HIGHLANDER03263_000_045<tab>Son, eh? Ha! You should've kept out of this, mate. Too late now.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_HIGHLANDER03263_000_045なんだお前は？
話を聞いてたってんなら、タダじゃ済まねぇぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_100_046<tab>Quickly, we've got to help him!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_100_046<tab>我らで彼を助けるのだ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_200_046<tab>Hnnngh!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_200_046<tab>ウウッ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_046<tab>Not now... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It's up to you!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_046す、すまない、また古傷が……。
ここは頼んだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_048<tab>Gods, why now!? Damn these seizures!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_048す、すまない、また古傷が……。
奴らを始末してくれ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_049<tab>Oh, Radovan! Of all the times!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_049オッサンってば、またこんなときに……！
)) (( )) 02 /var>、ヤツらをやっつけて！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_BALLOON_100_050<tab>Where'd <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> come from!?
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_BALLOON_100_050<tab>ほかにもいやがったか！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_BALLOON_100_051<tab>Don't let <var 08 E905 (('er)) (('im)) /var> get away!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_BALLOON_100_051<tab>生かして帰すな！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_050<tab>Never mind me! Go and see to Gerrart!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_050かたじけない……。
私は大丈夫だ、それよりゲラートを頼む。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_051<tab>Talk about bad timing...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_051ありがとう！
やっぱり、オッサンはポンコツだね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_060<tab>You saved us... How can I ever─
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_060た、助かった。
どうもありがとう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIELSBOY_000_061<tab>Daddy!
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_ORIELSBOY_000_061<tab>お父ちゃん！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_062<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I let you down. I let everyone down. But, Sophie─what happened here?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_062またも醜態を見せてしまい、すまなかった。
それにしても、いったいどういう状況なのだ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_063<tab>I knew from the moment I met Oriel there was something not quite right about her. It wasn't until later I realized: She's a somnus addict. Once it takes hold, it...changes you.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_063オリエルはソムヌス香の中毒者なんだね？
あれは中毒になると、正常な判断ができなくなる。
それこそ、薬を買うためなら実の息子を売ってしまうほどに……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_064<tab>She was able to keep her addiction hidden from most, but not from me, and probably not from her family either.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_064中毒者は、まともを装おうとしても、
感情の起伏が激しい、情緒不安定の症状を隠せない。
さっきの彼女の様子で気づいたよ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_065<tab>Yes, I've known for a while. But I had no idea she'd do something like this.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_065そのとおりだ。
でも、オリエルがそうなったのは、俺のせいなんだよ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_066<tab>Gods! If I hadn't started gambling, this never would've happened. My debts spiraled beyond my control, and she ran to get away from me, to start a new life with our son.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_066妻は俺が博打にハマって、借金を作ってしまったため、
息子を連れて逃げていったんだ。
もちろん、自業自得だってことはわかってるさ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_067<tab>The shock of losing them made me realize I couldn't live like that anymore. So I vowed to turn my life around, and I worked my fingers to the bone to repay the money I owed. But by the time I finally found the courage to track down Oriel, it was too late...
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_067そこで、後悔した俺は、心を入れ替えて博打をやめ、
必死で働いて借金を返し、オリエルに復縁してもらおうとした。
すると、今度は彼女がソムヌス香中毒になっていたんだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_068<tab>She'd made new friends─the wrong sort of friends─and had to resort to gods only know what to make ends meet. It became too much to bear, and somnus was her only escape. Nothing else mattered to her, not even her own child.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_068ウルダハで、女手ひとつで子供を育てるのは容易じゃない。
孤独や生活苦から逃れようと、つい手を出してしまったんだろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_069<tab>So you see, it wasn't only my life I'd ruined. I made her who she is today. That's why I don't have it in me to hate her.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_069妻と息子の人生を狂わせたのはこの俺だ。
だからこそ、なんとか救ってやりたかったんだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_070<tab>What will you do now?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_070それで……
これから、どうするつもりなの？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_071<tab>I plan to send her to Frondale's Phrontistery. They can treat people like Oriel, although it costs more than most folks can afford. My savings should cover it for a short while, at least.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_071オリエルはフロンデール薬学院にある、
薬物依存症の更生施設に入れる。
ティムは俺が責任をもって育てよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_072<tab>We'll take it one day at a time and see how she responds to the treatment. I know she might never recover, but I can't give up on her. Obviously, she's in no fit state to look after Timm, so he'll be living with me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_072そして、妻が更生して戻ってきたら、
もう一度、家族三人でやり直すつもりだ。
どうか信じてくれ、俺は本気だ……！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_073<tab>You could've been killed confronting those slavers. If you wind up dead, there'll be no one to look after the boy. From now on, you'll have to think before you act.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_073……わかった。
屈強な男たちに丸腰で向かっていった、
その勇気に免じて、君を信じることにしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_074<tab>I will, I swear it. Thank you all, for everything you've done.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_GERRART_000_074ありがとう。
今度こそ、絶対に家族を幸せにすると誓うよ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_075<tab>That poor child... Sophie's quick thinking may have saved him on this occasion, but I fear his hardships are far from over. I, on the other hand, only succeeded in disgracing myself. Again.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_075今回はソフィーの機転に救われたな。
情けないことに、私はまた肝心なときに……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_076<tab>It's not your fault, Radovan. I think you owe <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> an explanation, though.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_076いや、本当に勘弁してよ。
)) (( )) 02 /var>も気になってるだろうから、
オッサンがポンコツになった理由でも教えてあげたら？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_077<tab>Yes... If we are to fight side by side, there is something you should know.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_077ポンコツではないと言いたいところだが……
二度にわたって、私が見せた醜態のわけを話そう……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_078<tab>Though I served as an imperial conscript for a time, after I disobeyed a direct order I was sentenced to solitary confinement for more than a decade.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_078帝国軍の徴用兵だった頃、私は上官に逆らったことで投獄され、
実に10年以上、独房に入れられていたのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_079<tab>Like many of the inmates, I was forced to wear a magitek collar.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_079そこでは、囚人の反抗を抑えるための、
忌まわしき魔導仕掛けの「首輪」を付けられていた。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_080<tab>The wardens could use them to administer a severe electric shock any time they pleased. And please them it did.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_080それは、囚人の身体に雷気を流し、
苦痛を与えて全身の自由を奪い、服従させるというもの。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_081<tab>The paralysis would eventually wear off, but even now, years after removing the collar, my whole body will suddenly seize up. It's as though the pain never left me, and could reawaken at any moment.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_081収監中、繰り返し雷気を流された私には後遺症が残り、
ときに身体中に激痛が走って、動けなくなるようになった。
くだんの醜態はその症状によるものだったのだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_082<tab>Thankfully, my condition appears to have improved somewhat since leaving the Empire. Perhaps one day I will be free of it, but until then, there's no telling when it might strike.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_082だが、安心してくれ。
エオルゼアに来たことで、逃亡中よりも生活が改善されたため、
この後遺症は完治しつつある……もう二度と醜態は繰り返さない！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_083<tab>Radovan's saved my bacon more times than I can count, so it's only fair that I do the same for him. We've been through thick and thin, ever since the first time we met in that Garlean gaol.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_083それならいいんだけどね……。
ついでに話しておくけど、
アタシもオッサンと同じ帝国の監獄にいたの。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_084<tab>I was awaiting execution along with the other captured members of the resistance, as well as various insurgents and undesirables.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_084まあ、アタシの場合はレジスタンスの諜報活動中に囚われ、
処刑を待つ間、雑居房に入れられてたんだけどね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_085<tab>Among them were several somnus addicts. Even in an imperial gaol, there are ways to get your hands on it. When I saw Oriel, I couldn't put my finger on it at first, but she had the same look in her eyes as those lost souls.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_085ちなみに、そこでソムヌス香中毒者と過ごしたもんで、
今回、見抜くことができたんだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_086<tab>Anyway, where was I? So, Radovan had been meaning to escape ever since he was first imprisoned, and was secretly digging a tunnel, a few ilms each night, over the course of about ten years.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_086ところでなぜ、アタシたちが出会ったかというと、
これがまたおかしな話でさぁ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_087<tab>The only thing was, it went the wrong way. Then one night, he suddenly burst through my wall!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_087オッサンは脱獄するために、
10年かけて独房から外に至る抜け穴を掘っていたの。
それがついに開通した先がぁ……アタシのいる雑居房だったんだ！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_088<tab>Why did you have to tell <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> that!? You know I'm far from proud of my...miscalculation.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_088ちょ、ちょっと、計算が狂っただけだ。
お前はそれで命拾いしたのだから、ありがたく思え。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_089<tab>Well, things worked out in the end, didn't they? The other inmates made such a racket when you came crashing in, it drew the attention of the wardens, and all hells broke loose.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_089はいはい、感謝してるよ。
絶望のなかで、処刑を待つばかりだったアタシは、
穴から出てきた、オッサンの間抜け面に救われたんだからね。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_090<tab>In the confusion, Radovan and I forced our way past the guards, and by some miracle, we managed to avoid their searchlights. And finally, we were free.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_090結果的に、ふたりで力をあわせることで、
警備が手薄だった雑居房から抜け出すことができたってわけ。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_091<tab>Free to return to my wife and child, to my homeland. Or so I thought...
target: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_091<tab>ああ、だが脱獄は果たしたものの……

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_092<tab>While I'd been rotting away in a Garlean cell, everything I knew, everything I loved had been taken from me. I should have been there. But I couldn't even─
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_092私はすでに帰るべき場所を失っていたんだ。
ゲラートと同じく、私にも妻と幼い息子がいたのだが、
ふたりとも……護ることができなかった……。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_093<tab>Gah! Enough of this. We've spoken overlong as it is. Well then, where to next?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_093おっといかん、またひとりで感傷的になってしまった……。
さて、また次の都市へ向かうとしよう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_094<tab>I think I've had my fill of Ul'dah. What say we try our luck in Limsa Lominsa? I'm sure a change of scenery will do us a world of good!
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_094じゃあ、海を渡って、リムサ・ロミンサに行こう！
港の街だから、世界中の物が集まっているらしいね！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_095<tab>Yes, I like the sound of that. Let's reconvene at the local Adventurers' Guild.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_095いいだろう、それではまた、
リムサ・ロミンサの冒険者ギルドへ向かい、仕事を探そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_098<tab>So, what do you think?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_098また、新しい服を買っちゃった！
どうかしら、これ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_100<tab>A city founded by pirates? Now there's a terrible idea if ever I heard one. With all the cutthroats running rampant, I'm surprised there's anyone left.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_100リムサ・ロミンサとは、海賊が興した街だけに、
自由で大らかな雰囲気が漂っているな。

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_101<tab>But what about the views? The sea breeze?
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_SOPHIE_000_101海はキレイだし、珍しい物も売ってるし、最高だね！
また、新しい服を買っちゃった！

source: TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_102<tab>There'll be plenty of time to enjoy ourselves once we've a few more gil in our pockets. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we're still waiting for word from the Guild, so perhaps you should find somewhere for a few practice swings in the meantime.
target:
TEXT_LUCKBB111_03263_RADOVAN_000_102冒険者ギルドには、いまのところ護衛の依頼はなかった。
また仕事が見つかるまで、君は鍛錬を積んでおいてほしい。
